Topic.Title: creating a command-interface like in a point&click?

Posts.EditableText:
hi folks..

again i have two questions..
i allready saw the option "panes off", but..

can i get rid just off the compass but still use the inventory window?

is it possible to insert a window (just like the inventory-window) creating an interface with my personal basic commands (like in a click & point adventure: look, talk to, push, pull,...) that the player can combine then with objects from the inventory or objects seen in the room?

and as well if it would be possible not only to say "go north" but "go to living room"..

anybody ever had the same ideas or problems? any experiences?
looking forward to your help,
o.
